content.description: You will have a conversation with Maya Miura, a friend, about an upcoming event that you plan to attend.
content.question:
Give your opinion.
じゃ、そうしよう。ちょっと遠いよね。どうやって行くのが一番いいと思う？

frqParts.text:
Give your opinion.
じゃ、そうしよう。ちょっと遠いよね。どうやって行くのが一番いいと思う？

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
